name: Offlined
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45

You have just been OFFLINED.

Your computer just broke, taking with it all your hardware and your hard-earned save data and progress in OnlineQuest. In a society where your level and reputation online is everything, you have been reduced to nothing. Time to find your way back from the bottom by locating new parts for your computer, reuniting with your disbanded party and level-grinding your way back up to the top.

Controls: 
- A/D = Move L/R
-E = Interact
